email_error_amount: Email must be less than 100 characters.
username_error_amount: Username must be at most 60 characters.
username_error_invalid_characters: Username can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, hyphens, and periods.
password_error_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
password_error_max_length: Password cannot be longer than 71 characters.
password_error_mismatch: Password and confirm password do not match.
title_error_amount_min: Title must be at least 3 characters.
title_error_amount_max: Title must be at most 100 characters.
description_error_amount_max: Description must be at most 800 characters.
avatar_error_size: Avatar size must be less than 10MB.
image_description_error_size: Image size must be less than 15MB.
access_gallery: We need access to the gallery.
